full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

## Tender Information

- **Solicitation Number**: R000149612
- **Tender Closing Date**: 2023-11-12T14:00:00
- **Expected Contract Start Date**: 2023-12-11

## Contract Description

The Shared Services Canada (SSC) is soliciting proposals for Task-Based Informatics Professional Services (TBIPS) to support the provision of IT consulting services. This requirement is open only to Task-Based Informatics Professional Service (TBIPS) Supply Arrangement under Tier 2 Stream Holders who are qualified under the TBIPS.

A solicitation was issued against the TBIPS Supply Arrangements (SA) under the following numbers: PWGSC file number EN578-170432. The terms and conditions of the SA apply and must be incorporated into any resulting contract.

## Invited Companies

Companies invited to submit proposals under this tender are listed below:

* 01 Millennium Consulting Inc.
* 10947482 Canada Inc.
* ...
* Zernam Enterprise Inc.

## Notice Type

This tender is a Request for Proposal (RFP) against the Supply Arrangement (SA) under Tier 2 Stream.

## Procurement Method

This tender is a competitive and selective procurement.

## Selection Criteria

The selection of the successful contractors will be based on the highest combined rating of technical merit and price.

## Trade Agreements

This tender is subject to the following trade agreements:
- Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
- Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
- Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
- Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
- Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
- World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
- Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
- Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
- Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)

## Tendering Information

Responses to this tender must be submitted in accordance with the instructions provided in the solicitation package.

## Contact Information

For further information regarding this tender, please contact:
- Krys Pikula
- Email: Krys.pikula@ssc-spc.gc.ca 
- Phone: (613) 668-2207

## Notice URL

The notice can be accessed online at [insert URL]

## Summary

Shared Services Canada is seeking proposals from qualified contractors to provide IT consulting services under the Task-Based Informatics Professional Services (TBIPS) Supply
